intent: Buy product(s)
expressions: Hi, I am looking to buy {{product_name1}}s
Hi, I am looking for {{product_name1}}s
Hey {{seller_name}}, Do you supply {{product_name1}}s

intent: Buy product(s) with specify quantity
expressions: Hi, I am looking to buy {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s
Hi, I am looking for {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s
Hey {{seller_name}},Do you supply {{product_name1}}s? I need {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s

intent: Buy product with quantity and delivery location
expressions: Hi, I am looking to buy {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s, delivered at {{delivery_location}}
Hi, I am looking for {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s. Items need to be shipped to {{delivery_location}}
Hey {{seller_name}},Do you supply {{product_name1}}s? I need {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s
Hey {{seller_name}},Do you supply {{product_name1}}s? I need {{product_quantity1}}

intent: Buy two product(s)
expressions: Hi, I am looking to buy {{product_name1}}s and {{product_name2}}s
Hi, I am looking for {{product_name1}}s and {{product_name2}}s

intent: Buy product(s) with specify quantity

Hi, I am looking for {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s and {{product_quantity2}} {{product_name2}}s

intent: Buy product with quantity and delivery location
expressions: Hi, I am looking to buy  {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s and {{product_quantity2}} {{product_name2}}s, delivered at {{delivery_location}}

expressions: {{product_quantity1}}
I need {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s

I need {{product_quantity1}} {{product_name1}}s and location is {{delivery_location}}

{{product_quantity1}}

{{product_quantity2}}

expressions: I think price is A bit high, Can you reconsider price?
I think price is too much
Can i get an overall discount?

intent: Ask for price/quotation

What is the cost?

intent: Ask for revised price/quotation
expressions: I think price is on higher side, can you reconsider price
Is that your final price?, I expect some discount
Can you reduce the price?
Would there be any discount?
Please reconsider the final price, It's a bit too high

expressions: I think price of {{product_name1}}s is a bit high, can you reconsider price
Can you reduce the price of {{product_name1}}s?
Would there be any discount on {{product_name1}}s?

expressions: I don't think this price point works for me , let's drop the deal
